sentences.en: ‘I can’t open this drawer.’ ‘Here, let me have a go .’
sentences.cn: “我打不开这个抽屉。”“来，让我试试看。”

sentences.en: "Does it sound like music?" — "I wouldn't go that far."
sentences.cn: “这听上去像音乐吗？”——“我可不那样认为。”

sentences.en: Armstrong was boxed in with 300 metres to go.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗在离目的地还有300米的地方被堵住不能动弹。

sentences.en: as castles go it is small and old.
sentences.cn: 与一般城堡相比，它小而古老。

sentences.en: Go it, Dad! Give him what for!.
sentences.cn: 爸爸，猛点劲！给他一顿饱拳！。

sentences.en: Go north on I-15 to the exit just past Barstow.
sentences.cn: 沿着15号州际公路一直向北，一过巴斯托就从出口驶出。

sentences.en: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.cn: 她的头发开始变白了。

sentences.en: I had a good go (= tried hard ) at cleaning the silver.
sentences.cn: 我费了老大的劲清洁银器。

sentences.en: I never go on the bus into the town.
sentences.cn: 我从不坐公共汽车去城里。

sentences.en: I want a girl who's sexy, but in a subtle way—that's what gets me going.
sentences.cn: 我需要一个性感女孩，不过要隐隐约约地性感的那一种性感——就是能让我兴奋的那种类型。

sentences.en: I was going on fourteen when I went to my first gig.
sentences.cn: 我第一次乘快艇时已快14岁了。

sentences.en: I’d thought about it for some time and decided to give it a go (= try to do something ) .
sentences.cn: 这事我考虑了一段时间，决定尝试一下。

sentences.en: I’m not sure it will work but it’s worth a go .
sentences.cn: 我不知道这是否可行，但是值得一试。

sentences.en: It's a long way to go for two people in their seventies.
sentences.cn: 对于两个七十几岁的人来说，这段路太远了。

sentences.en: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.cn: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.en: Naomi used to go to church in Granville every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米以前每个星期天都去格兰维尔的教堂做礼拜。

sentences.en: On the tour, everyone can have a go at making a pot.
sentences.cn: 这次去参观，每个人都可以试着做一个陶罐。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: Sylvia, camera in hand, asked, "Where do we go first?"
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅手里拿着相机问道：“我们先去哪里？”

sentences.en: the book is a useful catalogue as far as it goes.
sentences.cn: 就这本书本身而言，它是个有用的目录。

sentences.en: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.cn: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.en: The governor went further by agreeing that all policy announcements should be made first in the House.
sentences.cn: 该州长进一步同意所有政策的宣布都应首先在议院进行。

sentences.en: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.cn: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentences.cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentences.en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
sentences.cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

sentences.en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentences.cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentences.en: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
sentences.cn: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

sentences.en: You can go anyplace to get the car serviced.
sentences.cn: 你可以去任何地方给汽车作检修。

sentences.en: You don't have to go running upstairs every time she rings.
sentences.cn: 用不着她一来电话你就往楼上跑。

sentences.en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentences.cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

words.tran_cn: 流行的；进行中的；现存的
动态物；离去的人；常去…的人；有进取心的人
行为；离去；工作情况；地面状况

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式，旧)非常流行，风行一时
与一般的（或典型的）相比

phrases.phrase: as (或 so) far as it goes
phrases.tran_cn: 考虑到它的局限性（在找理由表扬某事物时说）
[口语]第一次尝试；一下子，一口气
(北美，非正式)［用来表示说话人认为某事是令人吃惊的，难以置信的］ 真不敢相信
参加；（太阳等）被云遮住；放得进
继续；过去；继续下去；发生
成为某事的证据（或证明）
(南非)一切顺利［用来对即将离开的人表达良好的祝愿］

phrases.phrase: going on ——(英亦作 going on for)
phrases.tran_cn: 接近（特定的时间、年龄或数量）
（拍卖人宣布）竞价就要结束（或已结束）

trans.tran_cn: 走，去，离开，去参加，去做…，变得，进展，通向，流逝，相称，放在，花掉，出售，出价购买，辞职，被放入，被寄出，处于…，开始，运转，做动作，唱，说，发出警告，响起，消失，衰退，死亡
trans.tran_en: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving
